value:
Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Gangrel:
Plegia's Mad King with Alfonse: Prince of Askr
on your team.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Grangrel:
Plegia's Mad King on Lunatic or higher
difficulty with Gangrel on your team.

Defeat Gangrel: Plegia's Mad King at level 40
or higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Defeat Gangrel: Plegia's Mad King at level 40
or higher with Gangrel: Plegia's Mad King.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Gangrel:
Plegia's Mad King on Lunatic or higher
difficulty using only armored allies.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Defeat a foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword infantry ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword armored ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword cavalry ally.
Defeat a foe with a sword flying ally.
Defeat an axe foe with a red tome ally.
Defeat a sword foe with a blue tome ally.
Defeat a lance foe with a green tome ally.

Defeat a colorless bow foe with a red
tome ally.

Defeat a colorless dagger foe with a blue
tome ally.
Defeat a staff foe with a green tome ally.

Defeat an axe foe that is level 30 or higher
with a red tome ally.

Defeat a sword foe that is level 30 or higher
with a blue tome ally.

Defeat a lance foe that is level 30 or higher
with a green tome ally.

Defeat a colorless bow foe that is level 30 or
higher with a red tome ally.

Defeat a colorless dagger foe that is level 30 or
higher with a blue tome ally.

Defeat a staff foe that is level 30 or higher
with a green tome ally.

Clear Paralogue 58: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 58: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 58: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Son of Frelia's king, Hayden. Harbors a fierce
rivalry with the prince of the neighboring
kingdom, Renais. Appears in Fire Emblem:
The Sacred Stones.

Princess of Frelia, and sister to Innes. Wants only
to be friends with the twin prince and princess of
the neighboring kingdom, Renais. Appears in Fire
Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Beloved son of the emperor of Grado, Vigarde.
Like his father, who is referred to as the Silent
Emperor, he prefers to keep to himself. Appears
in Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Twin prince and princess of Renais, children
of King Fado. This lively brother and serene
sister make for quite the pair. Appear in Fire
Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Niece to Pontifex Mansel and princess of
Rausten. Her ultimate ambition is to rid the
world of monsters. Appears in Fire Emblem:
The Sacred Stones.

(Duo Skills can be used by tapping the Duo
button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units
deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 190, treats unit's stats as 190 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

Can boost their stats and damage, and
heal as well! Can use their Duo Skill
more than once, which grants dodge!

Can help all over the map with Canto
and the ability to warp near to allies!
Can effectively get Spd+20, Def+24.

Overwhelms foes with an effective
Atk+22 and counterattack blocking.
Uses Canto to attack and support.

Can effectively get Atk/Res+12 while
neutralizing penalties to those stats,
and can boost allies' Def/Res by +5.

$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of
an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit, and
also, if【Bonus】or【Penalty】is active on unit,
deals damage = 20% of foe's Def, and also,
if unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores HP to unit = 20% of foe's Def.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Unit can move to a space within 2 spaces of an
ally within 2 spaces. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during
combat, and also, if unit initiates combat,
grants Def/Res+10 during combat.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit
during combat, and also, if Special triggers
(excluding area-of-effect Specials), deals +7
damage and neutralizes "reduces damage by
X%" effects from non-Special skills.

Grants Atk+3. If foe initiates combat or if
foe's HP = 100% at start of combat, inflicts
Atk/Res-6 on foe and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Res during combat, and also,
if foe is colorless and uses bow, dagger, magic,
or staff, grants weapon-triangle advantage to
unit and inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage
on foe during combat.

Calculates damage from staff like other weapons.
At start of turn, inflicts Res-6 and status
preventing counterattacks on closest foes
within 5 spaces of unit through their next
actions. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd+6 during combat.

$aEnables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe during combat.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn +1.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger again. Unit's base movement has no
effect on movement granted. Cannot warp
(using skills like Wings of Mercy) a distance
greater than unit's remaining movement +1.)

$aEnables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe during combat.

destruction, unit can move spaces = any

$aGrants【Dodge】to unit and allies within 3 rows
and 3 columns centered on unit.

Once used, Duo Skill cannot be activated again
right away. At start of odd-numbered turns,
if Duo Skill has already been used, unit can use
Duo Skill again.

【Dodge】
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%).
